abstract: Some people never grow up. Thank goodness.
snippet: Some people never grow up. Thank goodness.
lead_paragraph: THURSDAY'S PUZZLE - Trust me, you've heard the joke before. Even so, it might get a snicker out of you; that's how silly it is. But that you have to kind of "guess" the content of the theme and work those Down entries to piece it together is what makes this a Thursday and not an early week puzzle.

headline.main: Thursday: So This Puzzle Walks Into a Bar ...
